alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Fulton; Williams (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 10:17AM EDT until April 09 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Tiffin River at Stryker affecting Williams, Fulton OH and Defiance Counties. .Recent heavy rain has resulted in rising water on area rivers. Rain and storms today may result in continued flooding. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tiffin River at Stryker. * WHEN...Until Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flooding of lowland areas around Stryker can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EDT Wednesday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EDT Wednesday was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river will fall below flood stage Friday morning to 10.9 feet. It will then return to flood stage Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Never drive vehicles through flooded areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or local media for further statements and updated forecasts. Detailed river forecasts and additional information can be found at www.weather.gov/iwx under Rivers and Lakes. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
